Keyboard shortcuts for Visual Studio Code

A visual cheat-sheet for the 124 keyboard shortcuts found in Microsoft's Visual Studio Code

Original Reference Report Issue

General

Show Command Palette

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • P

  • P
